Sample Request
POST /discoveryViews HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 688
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=NGMyYWI3YjUtNjcyNS00NDU3LWI2NjktNzYzMzExNTcyZjVi

{"name":"People","layout":"GRID","templates":{"default":"<h1>Person template from WSYWIG</h1>"},"styles":["color: maroon;"],"fields":["title"],"facets":[{"name":"Name","field":"name","opKey":"EQUALS","type":"STRING","sort":"COUNT","direction":"DESC","pageSize":20,"pageNumber":1,"collapsed":true,"hidden":false}],"filters":[{"field":"type","value":"FacultyMember","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"boosts":[{"field":"name","value":2.0}],"sort":[{"field":"name","direction":"ASC","date":false}],"export":[{"columnHeader":"Id","valuePath":"id"},{"columnHeader":"Name","valuePath":"name"}],"defaultSearchField":"overview","highlightFields":["overview"],"highlightPrefix":"<em>","highlightPostfix":"</em>"}
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Location: http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/6
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 1142

{
  "name" : "People",
  "layout" : "GRID",
  "templates" : {
    "default" : "<h1>Person template from WSYWIG</h1>"
  },
  "styles" : [ "color: maroon;" ],
  "fields" : [ "title" ],
  "facets" : [ {
    "name" : "Name",
    "field" : "name",
    "opKey" : "EQUALS",
    "type" : "STRING",
    "sort" : "COUNT",
    "direction" : "DESC",
    "pageSize" : 20,
    "pageNumber" : 1,
    "collapsed" : true,
    "hidden" : false
  } ],
  "filters" : [ {
    "field" : "type",
    "value" : "FacultyMember",
    "opKey" : "EQUALS"
  } ],
  "boosts" : [ {
    "field" : "name",
    "value" : 2.0
  } ],
  "sort" : [ {
    "field" : "name",
    "direction" : "ASC",
    "date" : false
  } ],
  "export" : [ {
    "columnHeader" : "Id",
    "valuePath" : "id"
  }, {
    "columnHeader" : "Name",
    "valuePath" : "name"
  } ],
  "defaultSearchField" : "overview",
  "highlightFields" : [ "overview" ],
  "highlightPrefix" : "<em>",
  "highlightPostfix" : "</em>",
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/6"
    },
    "discoveryView" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/6"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews' -i -X POST \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    --cookie 'SESSION=NGMyYWI3YjUtNjcyNS00NDU3LWI2NjktNzYzMzExNTcyZjVi' \
    -d '{"name":"People","layout":"GRID","templates":{"default":"<h1>Person template from WSYWIG</h1>"},"styles":["color: maroon;"],"fields":["title"],"facets":[{"name":"Name","field":"name","opKey":"EQUALS","type":"STRING","sort":"COUNT","direction":"DESC","pageSize":20,"pageNumber":1,"collapsed":true,"hidden":false}],"filters":[{"field":"type","value":"FacultyMember","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"boosts":[{"field":"name","value":2.0}],"sort":[{"field":"name","direction":"ASC","date":false}],"export":[{"columnHeader":"Id","valuePath":"id"},{"columnHeader":"Name","valuePath":"name"}],"defaultSearchField":"overview","highlightFields":["overview"],"highlightPrefix":"<em>","highlightPostfix":"</em>"}'

6.2.3. Delete

A discovery view can be deleted by passing the discoveryView id as a path parameter. This will return a NO_CONTENT (204) http status code as shown in the Sample Response.

Path Parameters
Table 19. /discoveryViews/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Discovery View id
Sample Request
DELETE /discoveryViews/1 HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=MmUyNThlYzktMTM0Ni00OTQ2LThiYTktM2U0YTg2NDZmODg3
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 204 No Content
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/1' -i -X DELETE \
    --cookie 'SESSION=MmUyNThlYzktMTM0Ni00OTQ2LThiYTktM2U0YTg2NDZmODg3'

6.2.4. Find by Id

A user can find a discovery view by providing discoveryView id as a path parameter. This returns a json response displaying the HttpStatus.OK(200) message along with the theme object as shown in the Sample Response.

Path Parameters
Table 20. /discoveryViews/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Theme id.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+name+

+String+

The name of the Discovery View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+layout+

+String+

The layout of the Discovery View.

+templates+

+Object+

The result templates of the Discovery View.

+styles+

+Array+

An array of result style strings of the Discovery View.

+fields+

+Array+

An array of fields of the Discovery View.

+facets+

+Array+

An array of Facet resources.

+filters+

+Array+

An array of Filters resources.

+boosts+

+Array+

An array of Boosts resources.

+sort+

+Array+

An array of Sort resources.

+export+

+Array+

An array of Export resources.

+defaultSearchField+

+String+

The default search field of the Discovery View.

+highlightFields+

+Array+

An array of highlight fields of the Discovery View.

+highlightPrefix+

+String+

The highlight prefix of the Discovery View.

+highlightPostfix+

+String+

The highlight postfix of the Discovery View.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
GET /discoveryViews/2 HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 1142

{
  "name" : "People",
  "layout" : "GRID",
  "templates" : {
    "default" : "<h1>Person template from WSYWIG</h1>"
  },
  "styles" : [ "color: maroon;" ],
  "fields" : [ "title" ],
  "facets" : [ {
    "name" : "Name",
    "field" : "name",
    "opKey" : "EQUALS",
    "type" : "STRING",
    "sort" : "COUNT",
    "direction" : "DESC",
    "pageSize" : 20,
    "pageNumber" : 1,
    "collapsed" : true,
    "hidden" : false
  } ],
  "filters" : [ {
    "field" : "type",
    "value" : "FacultyMember",
    "opKey" : "EQUALS"
  } ],
  "boosts" : [ {
    "field" : "name",
    "value" : 2.0
  } ],
  "sort" : [ {
    "field" : "name",
    "direction" : "ASC",
    "date" : false
  } ],
  "export" : [ {
    "columnHeader" : "Id",
    "valuePath" : "id"
  }, {
    "columnHeader" : "Name",
    "valuePath" : "name"
  } ],
  "defaultSearchField" : "overview",
  "highlightFields" : [ "overview" ],
  "highlightPrefix" : "<em>",
  "highlightPostfix" : "</em>",
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/2"
    },
    "discoveryView" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/2"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/2' -i -X GET

6.2.5. Patch

This helps an admin user to partially update a discovery view. This process utilizes the http patch protocol.

Path Parameters
Table 21. /discoveryViews/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Discovery View id.
Request Parameters
Parameter Description

+id+

The Discovery View id.

+name+

The name of the Discovery View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+layout+

The layout of the Discovery View.

+templates+

The result templates of the Discovery View.

+styles+

An array of result style strings of the Discovery View.

+fields+

An array of fields of the Discovery View.

+facets+

An array of Facet resources.

+filters+

An array of Filters resources.

+boosts+

An array of Boosts resources.

+sort+

An array of Sort resources.

+export+

An array of Export resources.

+defaultSearchField+

The default search field of the Discovery View.

+highlightFields+

An array of highlight fields of the Discovery View.

+highlightPrefix+

The highlight prefix of the Discovery View.

+highlightPostfix+

The highlight postfix of the Discovery View.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+name+

+String+

The name of the Discovery View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+layout+

+String+

The layout of the Discovery View.

+templates+

+Object+

The result templates of the Discovery View.

+styles+

+Array+

An array of result style strings of the Discovery View.

+fields+

+Array+

An array of fields of the Discovery View.

+facets+

+Array+

An array of Facet resources.

+filters+

+Array+

An array of Filters resources.

+boosts+

+Array+

An array of Boosts resources.

+sort+

+Array+

An array of Sort resources.

+export+

+Array+

An array of Export resources.

+defaultSearchField+

+String+

The default search field of the Discovery View.

+highlightFields+

+Array+

An array of highlight fields of the Discovery View.

+highlightPrefix+

+String+

The highlight prefix of the Discovery View.

+highlightPostfix+

+String+

The highlight postfix of the Discovery View.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
PATCH /discoveryViews/5 HTTP/1.1
Content-Length: 25
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=MDYyNzU5NGItNDViZi00YmU1LTk2YTItMDE2YmNiMGVkYjc1

{"name": "Organizations"}
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 1149

{
  "name" : "Organizations",
  "layout" : "GRID",
  "templates" : {
    "default" : "<h1>Person template from WSYWIG</h1>"
  },
  "styles" : [ "color: maroon;" ],
  "fields" : [ "title" ],
  "facets" : [ {
    "name" : "Name",
    "field" : "name",
    "opKey" : "EQUALS",
    "type" : "STRING",
    "sort" : "COUNT",
    "direction" : "DESC",
    "pageSize" : 20,
    "pageNumber" : 1,
    "collapsed" : true,
    "hidden" : false
  } ],
  "filters" : [ {
    "field" : "type",
    "value" : "FacultyMember",
    "opKey" : "EQUALS"
  } ],
  "boosts" : [ {
    "field" : "name",
    "value" : 2.0
  } ],
  "sort" : [ {
    "field" : "name",
    "direction" : "ASC",
    "date" : false
  } ],
  "export" : [ {
    "columnHeader" : "Id",
    "valuePath" : "id"
  }, {
    "columnHeader" : "Name",
    "valuePath" : "name"
  } ],
  "defaultSearchField" : "overview",
  "highlightFields" : [ "overview" ],
  "highlightPrefix" : "<em>",
  "highlightPostfix" : "</em>",
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/5"
    },
    "discoveryView" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/5"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/5' -i -X PATCH \
    --cookie 'SESSION=MDYyNzU5NGItNDViZi00YmU1LTk2YTItMDE2YmNiMGVkYjc1' \
    -d '{"name": "Organizations"}'

6.2.6. Update

This helps an admin user to update a specifc discovery view based on the discoveryView id provided in the path parameter. This utilizes the http put protocol.

Path Parameters
Table 22. /discoveryViews/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Discovery View id.
Request Fields
Path Type Description

+id+

+Number+

The Discovery View id.

+name+

+String+

The name of the Discovery View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+layout+

+String+

The layout of the Discovery View.

+templates+

+Object+

The result templates of the Discovery View.

+styles+

+Array+

An array of result style strings of the Discovery View.

+fields+

+Array+

An array of fields of the Discovery View.

+facets+

+Array+

An array of Facet resources.

+filters+

+Array+

An array of Filters resources.

+boosts+

+Array+

An array of Boosts resources.

+sort+

+Array+

An array of Sort resources.

+export+

+Array+

An array of Export resources.

+defaultSearchField+

+String+

The default search field of the Discovery View.

+highlightFields+

+Array+

An array of highlight fields of the Discovery View.

+highlightPrefix+

+String+

The highlight prefix of the Discovery View.

+highlightPostfix+

+String+

The highlight postfix of the Discovery View.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+name+

+String+

The name of the Discovery View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+layout+

+String+

The layout of the Discovery View.

+templates+

+Object+

The result templates of the Discovery View.

+styles+

+Array+

An array of result style strings of the Discovery View.

+fields+

+Array+

An array of fields of the Discovery View.

+facets+

+Array+

An array of Facet resources.

+filters+

+Array+

An array of Filters resources.

+boosts+

+Array+

An array of Boosts resources.

+sort+

+Array+

An array of Sort resources.

+export+

+Array+

An array of Export resources.

+defaultSearchField+

+String+

The default search field of the Discovery View.

+highlightFields+

+Array+

An array of highlight fields of the Discovery View.

+highlightPrefix+

+String+

The highlight prefix of the Discovery View.

+highlightPostfix+

+String+

The highlight postfix of the Discovery View.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
PUT /discoveryViews/3 HTTP/1.1
Content-Length: 702
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=M2ZkMmQ2OTYtN2MyZi00NjI1LTgxYmMtMDVlNzhiMzU3YWNk

{"id":3,"name":"Organizations","layout":"GRID","templates":{"default":"<h1>Person template from WSYWIG</h1>"},"styles":["color: maroon;"],"fields":["title"],"facets":[{"name":"Name","field":"name","opKey":"EQUALS","type":"STRING","sort":"COUNT","direction":"DESC","pageSize":20,"pageNumber":1,"collapsed":true,"hidden":false}],"filters":[{"field":"type","value":"FacultyMember","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"boosts":[{"field":"name","value":2.0}],"sort":[{"field":"name","direction":"ASC","date":false}],"export":[{"columnHeader":"Id","valuePath":"id"},{"columnHeader":"Name","valuePath":"name"}],"defaultSearchField":"overview","highlightFields":["overview"],"highlightPrefix":"<em>","highlightPostfix":"</em>"}
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Location: http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/3
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 1149

{
  "name" : "Organizations",
  "layout" : "GRID",
  "templates" : {
    "default" : "<h1>Person template from WSYWIG</h1>"
  },
  "styles" : [ "color: maroon;" ],
  "fields" : [ "title" ],
  "facets" : [ {
    "name" : "Name",
    "field" : "name",
    "opKey" : "EQUALS",
    "type" : "STRING",
    "sort" : "COUNT",
    "direction" : "DESC",
    "pageSize" : 20,
    "pageNumber" : 1,
    "collapsed" : true,
    "hidden" : false
  } ],
  "filters" : [ {
    "field" : "type",
    "value" : "FacultyMember",
    "opKey" : "EQUALS"
  } ],
  "boosts" : [ {
    "field" : "name",
    "value" : 2.0
  } ],
  "sort" : [ {
    "field" : "name",
    "direction" : "ASC",
    "date" : false
  } ],
  "export" : [ {
    "columnHeader" : "Id",
    "valuePath" : "id"
  }, {
    "columnHeader" : "Name",
    "valuePath" : "name"
  } ],
  "defaultSearchField" : "overview",
  "highlightFields" : [ "overview" ],
  "highlightPrefix" : "<em>",
  "highlightPostfix" : "</em>",
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/3"
    },
    "discoveryView" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/3"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/discoveryViews/3' -i -X PUT \
    --cookie 'SESSION=M2ZkMmQ2OTYtN2MyZi00NjI1LTgxYmMtMDVlNzhiMzU3YWNk' \
    -d '{"id":3,"name":"Organizations","layout":"GRID","templates":{"default":"<h1>Person template from WSYWIG</h1>"},"styles":["color: maroon;"],"fields":["title"],"facets":[{"name":"Name","field":"name","opKey":"EQUALS","type":"STRING","sort":"COUNT","direction":"DESC","pageSize":20,"pageNumber":1,"collapsed":true,"hidden":false}],"filters":[{"field":"type","value":"FacultyMember","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"boosts":[{"field":"name","value":2.0}],"sort":[{"field":"name","direction":"ASC","date":false}],"export":[{"columnHeader":"Id","valuePath":"id"},{"columnHeader":"Name","valuePath":"name"}],"defaultSearchField":"overview","highlightFields":["overview"],"highlightPrefix":"<em>","highlightPostfix":"</em>"}'

6.3. Display Views

This section describes about the display views of the application. This object is a persistent representation of a display UI.

6.3.1. Directory

This displays a list of all the display view objects based on parameters like page, size or sort feature based on name, collection etc as shown in Request Parameters.

Request Parameters
Parameter Description

+page+

The page number.

+size+

The page size.

+sort+

The page sort.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+_embedded.displayViews+

+Array+

An array of Display View resources.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.

+page+

+Object+

Page details for Display View resources.
Sample Request
GET /displayViews?page=0&size=20&sort=name HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2936

{
  "_embedded" : {
    "displayViews" : [ {
      "name" : "People",
      "types" : [ "FacultyMember" ],
      "mainContentTemplate" : "<div>Main</div>",
      "leftScanTemplate" : "<div>Left Scan</div>",
      "rightScanTemplate" : "<div>Right Scan</div>",
      "asideTemplate" : "<div>Aside</div>",
      "asideLocation" : "RIGHT",
      "exportView" : {
        "name" : "Test",
        "contentTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Content!</span></body></html>",
        "headerTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Header!</span></body></html>",
        "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
        "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
        "fieldViews" : [ {
          "name" : "Test",
          "field" : "publications",
          "filters" : [ {
            "field" : "type",
            "value" : "Test",
            "opKey" : "EQUALS"
          } ],
          "sort" : [ {
            "field" : "date",
            "direction" : "DESC",
            "date" : true
          } ],
          "limit" : 10
        } ]
      },
      "metaTemplates" : {
        "default" : "Meta tag template"
      },
      "embedTemplates" : {
        "default" : "<div>Hello, Embedded!</div>"
      },
      "tabs" : [ {
        "name" : "Test",
        "hidden" : false,
        "sections" : [ {
          "name" : "Test",
          "field" : "name",
          "filters" : [ {
            "field" : "type",
            "value" : "Test",
            "opKey" : "EQUALS"
          } ],
          "sort" : [ {
            "field" : "name",
            "direction" : "ASC",
            "date" : false
          } ],
          "hidden" : false,
          "shared" : false,
          "paginated" : false,
          "pageSize" : 5,
          "template" : "<span>Hello, World!</span>",
          "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
          "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
          "subsections" : [ {
            "name" : "Test",
            "field" : "publications",
            "filters" : [ {
              "field" : "type",
              "value" : "Test",
              "opKey" : "EQUALS"
            } ],
            "sort" : [ {
              "field" : "date",
              "direction" : "DESC",
              "date" : false
            } ],
            "pageSize" : 5,
            "template" : "<div>Subsection</div>"
          } ]
        } ]
      } ],
      "_links" : {
        "self" : {
          "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/3"
        },
        "displayView" : {
          "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/3"
        }
      }
    } ]
  },
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews"
    },
    "profile" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/profile/displayViews"
    },
    "search" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/search"
    }
  },
  "page" : {
    "size" : 20,
    "totalElements" : 1,
    "totalPages" : 1,
    "number" : 1
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/displayViews?page=0&size=20&sort=name' -i -X GET

6.3.2. Create

A display view is created by adding a fields like name, collection, index etc along with other variables as shown in the Request Fields.

Request Fields
Path Type Description

+name+

+String+

The name of the Display View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+types+

+Array+

An array of types.

+mainContentTemplate+

+String+

The main content template of the Display View.

+leftScanTemplate+

+String+

The left scan template of the Display View.

+rightScanTemplate+

+String+

The right scan template of the Display View.

+asideTemplate+

+String+

The aside template of the Display View.

+asideLocation+

+String+

The aside location [LEFT,RIGHT] of the Display View.

+metaTemplates+

+Object+

The meta tag templates of the Display View.

+embedTemplates+

+Object+

The embed templates of the Display View.

+tabs+

+Array+

An array of Display tab view resources.

+exportView+

+Object+

The export view of the Display View.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+name+

+String+

The name of the Display View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+types+

+Array+

An array of types.

+mainContentTemplate+

+String+

The main content template of the Display View.

+leftScanTemplate+

+String+

The left scan template of the Display View.

+rightScanTemplate+

+String+

The right scan template of the Display View.

+asideTemplate+

+String+

The aside template of the Display View.

+asideLocation+

+String+

The aside location [LEFT,RIGHT] of the Display View.

+metaTemplates+

+Object+

The meta tag templates of the Display View.

+embedTemplates+

+Object+

The embed templates of the Display View.

+tabs+

+Array+

An array of Display tab view resources.

+exportView+

+Object+

The export view of the Display View.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
POST /displayViews HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 1340
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=NjJlNjdiNjItNGJkZC00MWZkLWJjMGItOTdhYzJmOTU5MGU3

{"name":"People","types":["FacultyMember"],"mainContentTemplate":"<div>Main</div>","leftScanTemplate":"<div>Left Scan</div>","rightScanTemplate":"<div>Right Scan</div>","asideTemplate":"<div>Aside</div>","asideLocation":"RIGHT","exportView":{"name":"Test","contentTemplate":"<html><body><span>Hello, Content!</span></body></html>","headerTemplate":"<html><body><span>Hello, Header!</span></body></html>","requiredFields":["type"],"lazyReferences":["publications"],"fieldViews":[{"name":"Test","field":"publications","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"date","direction":"DESC","date":true}],"limit":10}]},"metaTemplates":{"default":"Meta tag template"},"embedTemplates":{"default":"<div>Hello, Embedded!</div>"},"tabs":[{"name":"Test","hidden":false,"sections":[{"name":"Test","field":"name","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"name","direction":"ASC","date":false}],"hidden":false,"shared":false,"paginated":false,"pageSize":5,"template":"<span>Hello, World!</span>","requiredFields":["type"],"lazyReferences":["publications"],"subsections":[{"name":"Test","field":"publications","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"date","direction":"DESC","date":false}],"pageSize":5,"template":"<div>Subsection</div>"}]}]}]}
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Location: http://localhost:8080/displayViews/5
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2185

{
  "name" : "People",
  "types" : [ "FacultyMember" ],
  "mainContentTemplate" : "<div>Main</div>",
  "leftScanTemplate" : "<div>Left Scan</div>",
  "rightScanTemplate" : "<div>Right Scan</div>",
  "asideTemplate" : "<div>Aside</div>",
  "asideLocation" : "RIGHT",
  "exportView" : {
    "name" : "Test",
    "contentTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Content!</span></body></html>",
    "headerTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Header!</span></body></html>",
    "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
    "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
    "fieldViews" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "field" : "publications",
      "filters" : [ {
        "field" : "type",
        "value" : "Test",
        "opKey" : "EQUALS"
      } ],
      "sort" : [ {
        "field" : "date",
        "direction" : "DESC",
        "date" : true
      } ],
      "limit" : 10
    } ]
  },
  "metaTemplates" : {
    "default" : "Meta tag template"
  },
  "embedTemplates" : {
    "default" : "<div>Hello, Embedded!</div>"
  },
  "tabs" : [ {
    "name" : "Test",
    "hidden" : false,
    "sections" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "field" : "name",
      "filters" : [ {
        "field" : "type",
        "value" : "Test",
        "opKey" : "EQUALS"
      } ],
      "sort" : [ {
        "field" : "name",
        "direction" : "ASC",
        "date" : false
      } ],
      "hidden" : false,
      "shared" : false,
      "paginated" : false,
      "pageSize" : 5,
      "template" : "<span>Hello, World!</span>",
      "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
      "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
      "subsections" : [ {
        "name" : "Test",
        "field" : "publications",
        "filters" : [ {
          "field" : "type",
          "value" : "Test",
          "opKey" : "EQUALS"
        } ],
        "sort" : [ {
          "field" : "date",
          "direction" : "DESC",
          "date" : false
        } ],
        "pageSize" : 5,
        "template" : "<div>Subsection</div>"
      } ]
    } ]
  } ],
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/5"
    },
    "displayView" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/5"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/displayViews' -i -X POST \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    --cookie 'SESSION=NjJlNjdiNjItNGJkZC00MWZkLWJjMGItOTdhYzJmOTU5MGU3' \
    -d '{"name":"People","types":["FacultyMember"],"mainContentTemplate":"<div>Main</div>","leftScanTemplate":"<div>Left Scan</div>","rightScanTemplate":"<div>Right Scan</div>","asideTemplate":"<div>Aside</div>","asideLocation":"RIGHT","exportView":{"name":"Test","contentTemplate":"<html><body><span>Hello, Content!</span></body></html>","headerTemplate":"<html><body><span>Hello, Header!</span></body></html>","requiredFields":["type"],"lazyReferences":["publications"],"fieldViews":[{"name":"Test","field":"publications","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"date","direction":"DESC","date":true}],"limit":10}]},"metaTemplates":{"default":"Meta tag template"},"embedTemplates":{"default":"<div>Hello, Embedded!</div>"},"tabs":[{"name":"Test","hidden":false,"sections":[{"name":"Test","field":"name","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"name","direction":"ASC","date":false}],"hidden":false,"shared":false,"paginated":false,"pageSize":5,"template":"<span>Hello, World!</span>","requiredFields":["type"],"lazyReferences":["publications"],"subsections":[{"name":"Test","field":"publications","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"date","direction":"DESC","date":false}],"pageSize":5,"template":"<div>Subsection</div>"}]}]}]}'

6.3.3. Delete

A display view can be deleted by passing the displayView id as a path parameter. This will return a NO_CONTENT (204) http status code as shown in the Sample Response.

Path Parameters
Table 23. /displayViews/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Display View id
Sample Request
DELETE /displayViews/1 HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=YjcyYjRmYzctM2E1Ny00YjBkLWI2YTItZGIzYmNjNTc3NjM3
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 204 No Content
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/displayViews/1' -i -X DELETE \
    --cookie 'SESSION=YjcyYjRmYzctM2E1Ny00YjBkLWI2YTItZGIzYmNjNTc3NjM3'

6.3.4. Find by Id

A user can find a display view by providing displayView id as a path parameter. This returns a json response displaying the HttpStatus.OK(200) message along with the display view object as shown in the Sample Response.

Path Parameters
Table 24. /displayViews/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Theme id.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+name+

+String+

The name of the Display View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+types+

+Array+

An array of types.

+mainContentTemplate+

+String+

The main content template of the Display View.

+leftScanTemplate+

+String+

The left scan template of the Display View.

+rightScanTemplate+

+String+

The right scan template of the Display View.

+asideTemplate+

+String+

The aside template of the Display View.

+asideLocation+

+String+

The aside location [LEFT,RIGHT] of the Display View.

+metaTemplates+

+Object+

The meta tag templates of the Display View.

+embedTemplates+

+Object+

The embed templates of the Display View.

+tabs+

+Array+

An array of Display tab view resources.

+exportView+

+Object+

The export view of the Display View.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
GET /displayViews/4 HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2185

{
  "name" : "People",
  "types" : [ "FacultyMember" ],
  "mainContentTemplate" : "<div>Main</div>",
  "leftScanTemplate" : "<div>Left Scan</div>",
  "rightScanTemplate" : "<div>Right Scan</div>",
  "asideTemplate" : "<div>Aside</div>",
  "asideLocation" : "RIGHT",
  "exportView" : {
    "name" : "Test",
    "contentTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Content!</span></body></html>",
    "headerTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Header!</span></body></html>",
    "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
    "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
    "fieldViews" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "field" : "publications",
      "filters" : [ {
        "field" : "type",
        "value" : "Test",
        "opKey" : "EQUALS"
      } ],
      "sort" : [ {
        "field" : "date",
        "direction" : "DESC",
        "date" : true
      } ],
      "limit" : 10
    } ]
  },
  "metaTemplates" : {
    "default" : "Meta tag template"
  },
  "embedTemplates" : {
    "default" : "<div>Hello, Embedded!</div>"
  },
  "tabs" : [ {
    "name" : "Test",
    "hidden" : false,
    "sections" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "field" : "name",
      "filters" : [ {
        "field" : "type",
        "value" : "Test",
        "opKey" : "EQUALS"
      } ],
      "sort" : [ {
        "field" : "name",
        "direction" : "ASC",
        "date" : false
      } ],
      "hidden" : false,
      "shared" : false,
      "paginated" : false,
      "pageSize" : 5,
      "template" : "<span>Hello, World!</span>",
      "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
      "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
      "subsections" : [ {
        "name" : "Test",
        "field" : "publications",
        "filters" : [ {
          "field" : "type",
          "value" : "Test",
          "opKey" : "EQUALS"
        } ],
        "sort" : [ {
          "field" : "date",
          "direction" : "DESC",
          "date" : false
        } ],
        "pageSize" : 5,
        "template" : "<div>Subsection</div>"
      } ]
    } ]
  } ],
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/4"
    },
    "displayView" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/4"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/displayViews/4' -i -X GET

6.3.5. Find by types in

A user can find a display view by providing displayView types as a request parameter. This returns a json response displaying the HttpStatus.OK(200) message along with the display view object as shown in the Sample Response.

Request Parameters
Parameter Description

+types+

The types the display view is for.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+name+

+String+

The name of the Display View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+types+

+Array+

An array of types.

+mainContentTemplate+

+String+

The main content template of the Display View.

+leftScanTemplate+

+String+

The left scan template of the Display View.

+rightScanTemplate+

+String+

The right scan template of the Display View.

+asideTemplate+

+String+

The aside template of the Display View.

+asideLocation+

+String+

The aside location [LEFT,RIGHT] of the Display View.

+metaTemplates+

+Object+

The meta tag templates of the Display View.

+embedTemplates+

+Object+

The embed templates of the Display View.

+tabs+

+Array+

An array of Display tab view resources.

+exportView+

+Object+

The export view of the Display View.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
GET /displayViews/search/findByTypesIn?types=FacultyMember HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2185

{
  "name" : "People",
  "types" : [ "FacultyMember" ],
  "mainContentTemplate" : "<div>Main</div>",
  "leftScanTemplate" : "<div>Left Scan</div>",
  "rightScanTemplate" : "<div>Right Scan</div>",
  "asideTemplate" : "<div>Aside</div>",
  "asideLocation" : "RIGHT",
  "exportView" : {
    "name" : "Test",
    "contentTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Content!</span></body></html>",
    "headerTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Header!</span></body></html>",
    "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
    "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
    "fieldViews" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "field" : "publications",
      "filters" : [ {
        "field" : "type",
        "value" : "Test",
        "opKey" : "EQUALS"
      } ],
      "sort" : [ {
        "field" : "date",
        "direction" : "DESC",
        "date" : true
      } ],
      "limit" : 10
    } ]
  },
  "metaTemplates" : {
    "default" : "Meta tag template"
  },
  "embedTemplates" : {
    "default" : "<div>Hello, Embedded!</div>"
  },
  "tabs" : [ {
    "name" : "Test",
    "hidden" : false,
    "sections" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "field" : "name",
      "filters" : [ {
        "field" : "type",
        "value" : "Test",
        "opKey" : "EQUALS"
      } ],
      "sort" : [ {
        "field" : "name",
        "direction" : "ASC",
        "date" : false
      } ],
      "hidden" : false,
      "shared" : false,
      "paginated" : false,
      "pageSize" : 5,
      "template" : "<span>Hello, World!</span>",
      "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
      "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
      "subsections" : [ {
        "name" : "Test",
        "field" : "publications",
        "filters" : [ {
          "field" : "type",
          "value" : "Test",
          "opKey" : "EQUALS"
        } ],
        "sort" : [ {
          "field" : "date",
          "direction" : "DESC",
          "date" : false
        } ],
        "pageSize" : 5,
        "template" : "<div>Subsection</div>"
      } ]
    } ]
  } ],
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/6"
    },
    "displayView" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/6"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/displayViews/search/findByTypesIn?types=FacultyMember' -i -X GET

6.3.6. Patch

This helps an admin user to partially update a display view. This process utilizes the http patch protocol.

Path Parameters
Table 25. /displayViews/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Display View id.
Request Parameters
Parameter Description

+id+

The Display View id.

+name+

The name of the Display View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+types+

An array of types.

+mainContentTemplate+

The main content template of the Display View.

+leftScanTemplate+

The left scan template of the Display View.

+rightScanTemplate+

The right scan template of the Display View.

+asideTemplate+

The aside template of the Display View.

+asideLocation+

The aside location [LEFT,RIGHT] of the Display View.

+metaTemplates+

The meta tag templates of the Display View.

+embedTemplates+

The embed templates of the Display View.

+tabs+

An array of Display tab view resources.

+exportView+

The export view of the Display View.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+name+

+String+

The name of the Display View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+types+

+Array+

An array of types.

+mainContentTemplate+

+String+

The main content template of the Display View.

+leftScanTemplate+

+String+

The left scan template of the Display View.

+rightScanTemplate+

+String+

The right scan template of the Display View.

+asideTemplate+

+String+

The aside template of the Display View.

+asideLocation+

+String+

The aside location [LEFT,RIGHT] of the Display View.

+metaTemplates+

+Object+

The meta tag templates of the Display View.

+embedTemplates+

+Object+

The embed templates of the Display View.

+tabs+

+Array+

An array of Display tab view resources.

+exportView+

+Object+

The export view of the Display View.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
PATCH /displayViews/7 HTTP/1.1
Content-Length: 25
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=MjkxN2I1NjMtOGZhMi00YjQxLTkxMTAtMWE0Y2QyNDM5ZTZi

{"name": "Organizations"}
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2192

{
  "name" : "Organizations",
  "types" : [ "FacultyMember" ],
  "mainContentTemplate" : "<div>Main</div>",
  "leftScanTemplate" : "<div>Left Scan</div>",
  "rightScanTemplate" : "<div>Right Scan</div>",
  "asideTemplate" : "<div>Aside</div>",
  "asideLocation" : "RIGHT",
  "exportView" : {
    "name" : "Test",
    "contentTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Content!</span></body></html>",
    "headerTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Header!</span></body></html>",
    "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
    "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
    "fieldViews" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "field" : "publications",
      "filters" : [ {
        "field" : "type",
        "value" : "Test",
        "opKey" : "EQUALS"
      } ],
      "sort" : [ {
        "field" : "date",
        "direction" : "DESC",
        "date" : true
      } ],
      "limit" : 10
    } ]
  },
  "metaTemplates" : {
    "default" : "Meta tag template"
  },
  "embedTemplates" : {
    "default" : "<div>Hello, Embedded!</div>"
  },
  "tabs" : [ {
    "name" : "Test",
    "hidden" : false,
    "sections" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "field" : "name",
      "filters" : [ {
        "field" : "type",
        "value" : "Test",
        "opKey" : "EQUALS"
      } ],
      "sort" : [ {
        "field" : "name",
        "direction" : "ASC",
        "date" : false
      } ],
      "hidden" : false,
      "shared" : false,
      "paginated" : false,
      "pageSize" : 5,
      "template" : "<span>Hello, World!</span>",
      "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
      "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
      "subsections" : [ {
        "name" : "Test",
        "field" : "publications",
        "filters" : [ {
          "field" : "type",
          "value" : "Test",
          "opKey" : "EQUALS"
        } ],
        "sort" : [ {
          "field" : "date",
          "direction" : "DESC",
          "date" : false
        } ],
        "pageSize" : 5,
        "template" : "<div>Subsection</div>"
      } ]
    } ]
  } ],
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/7"
    },
    "displayView" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/7"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/displayViews/7' -i -X PATCH \
    --cookie 'SESSION=MjkxN2I1NjMtOGZhMi00YjQxLTkxMTAtMWE0Y2QyNDM5ZTZi' \
    -d '{"name": "Organizations"}'

6.3.7. Update

This helps an admin user to update a specifc display view based on the displayView id provided in the query parameter. This utilizes the http put protocol.

Path Parameters
Table 26. /displayViews/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Display View id.
Request Fields
Path Type Description

+id+

+Number+

The Display View id.

+name+

+String+

The name of the Display View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+types+

+Array+

An array of types.

+mainContentTemplate+

+String+

The main content template of the Display View.

+leftScanTemplate+

+String+

The left scan template of the Display View.

+rightScanTemplate+

+String+

The right scan template of the Display View.

+asideTemplate+

+String+

The aside template of the Display View.

+asideLocation+

+String+

The aside location [LEFT,RIGHT] of the Display View.

+metaTemplates+

+Object+

The meta tag templates of the Display View.

+embedTemplates+

+Object+

The embed templates of the Display View.

+tabs+

+Array+

An array of Display tab view resources.

+exportView+

+Object+

The export view of the Display View.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+name+

+String+

The name of the Display View. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+types+

+Array+

An array of types.

+mainContentTemplate+

+String+

The main content template of the Display View.

+leftScanTemplate+

+String+

The left scan template of the Display View.

+rightScanTemplate+

+String+

The right scan template of the Display View.

+asideTemplate+

+String+

The aside template of the Display View.

+asideLocation+

+String+

The aside location [LEFT,RIGHT] of the Display View.

+metaTemplates+

+Object+

The meta tag templates of the Display View.

+embedTemplates+

+Object+

The embed templates of the Display View.

+tabs+

+Array+

An array of Display tab view resources.

+exportView+

+Object+

The export view of the Display View.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
PUT /displayViews/2 HTTP/1.1
Content-Length: 1408
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=YmY3MjI0ZjctOTE4Ni00MDEzLWJjNzEtZDdlNmFiODAxMzVl

{"id":2,"name":"Organizations","types":["FacultyMember","NonFacultyMember"],"mainContentTemplate":"<div>Main</div>","leftScanTemplate":"<div>Left Scan</div>","rightScanTemplate":"<div>Right Scan</div>","asideTemplate":"<div>Aside</div>","asideLocation":"RIGHT","exportView":{"id":2,"name":"Test","contentTemplate":"<html><body><span>Hello, Content!</span></body></html>","headerTemplate":"<html><body><span>Hello, Header!</span></body></html>","requiredFields":["type"],"lazyReferences":["publications"],"fieldViews":[{"id":2,"name":"Test","field":"publications","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"date","direction":"DESC","date":true}],"limit":10}]},"metaTemplates":{"default":"Meta tag template"},"embedTemplates":{"default":"<div>Hello, Embedded!</div>"},"tabs":[{"id":2,"name":"Test","hidden":false,"sections":[{"id":2,"name":"Test","field":"name","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"name","direction":"ASC","date":false}],"hidden":false,"shared":false,"paginated":false,"pageSize":5,"template":"<span>Hello, World!</span>","requiredFields":["type"],"lazyReferences":["publications"],"subsections":[{"id":2,"name":"Test","field":"publications","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"date","direction":"DESC","date":false}],"pageSize":5,"template":"<div>Subsection</div>"}]}]}]}
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Location: http://localhost:8080/displayViews/2
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2212

{
  "name" : "Organizations",
  "types" : [ "FacultyMember", "NonFacultyMember" ],
  "mainContentTemplate" : "<div>Main</div>",
  "leftScanTemplate" : "<div>Left Scan</div>",
  "rightScanTemplate" : "<div>Right Scan</div>",
  "asideTemplate" : "<div>Aside</div>",
  "asideLocation" : "RIGHT",
  "exportView" : {
    "name" : "Test",
    "contentTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Content!</span></body></html>",
    "headerTemplate" : "<html><body><span>Hello, Header!</span></body></html>",
    "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
    "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
    "fieldViews" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "field" : "publications",
      "filters" : [ {
        "field" : "type",
        "value" : "Test",
        "opKey" : "EQUALS"
      } ],
      "sort" : [ {
        "field" : "date",
        "direction" : "DESC",
        "date" : true
      } ],
      "limit" : 10
    } ]
  },
  "metaTemplates" : {
    "default" : "Meta tag template"
  },
  "embedTemplates" : {
    "default" : "<div>Hello, Embedded!</div>"
  },
  "tabs" : [ {
    "name" : "Test",
    "hidden" : false,
    "sections" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "field" : "name",
      "filters" : [ {
        "field" : "type",
        "value" : "Test",
        "opKey" : "EQUALS"
      } ],
      "sort" : [ {
        "field" : "name",
        "direction" : "ASC",
        "date" : false
      } ],
      "hidden" : false,
      "shared" : false,
      "paginated" : false,
      "pageSize" : 5,
      "template" : "<span>Hello, World!</span>",
      "requiredFields" : [ "type" ],
      "lazyReferences" : [ "publications" ],
      "subsections" : [ {
        "name" : "Test",
        "field" : "publications",
        "filters" : [ {
          "field" : "type",
          "value" : "Test",
          "opKey" : "EQUALS"
        } ],
        "sort" : [ {
          "field" : "date",
          "direction" : "DESC",
          "date" : false
        } ],
        "pageSize" : 5,
        "template" : "<div>Subsection</div>"
      } ]
    } ]
  } ],
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/2"
    },
    "displayView" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/displayViews/2"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/displayViews/2' -i -X PUT \
    --cookie 'SESSION=YmY3MjI0ZjctOTE4Ni00MDEzLWJjNzEtZDdlNmFiODAxMzVl' \
    -d '{"id":2,"name":"Organizations","types":["FacultyMember","NonFacultyMember"],"mainContentTemplate":"<div>Main</div>","leftScanTemplate":"<div>Left Scan</div>","rightScanTemplate":"<div>Right Scan</div>","asideTemplate":"<div>Aside</div>","asideLocation":"RIGHT","exportView":{"id":2,"name":"Test","contentTemplate":"<html><body><span>Hello, Content!</span></body></html>","headerTemplate":"<html><body><span>Hello, Header!</span></body></html>","requiredFields":["type"],"lazyReferences":["publications"],"fieldViews":[{"id":2,"name":"Test","field":"publications","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"date","direction":"DESC","date":true}],"limit":10}]},"metaTemplates":{"default":"Meta tag template"},"embedTemplates":{"default":"<div>Hello, Embedded!</div>"},"tabs":[{"id":2,"name":"Test","hidden":false,"sections":[{"id":2,"name":"Test","field":"name","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"name","direction":"ASC","date":false}],"hidden":false,"shared":false,"paginated":false,"pageSize":5,"template":"<span>Hello, World!</span>","requiredFields":["type"],"lazyReferences":["publications"],"subsections":[{"id":2,"name":"Test","field":"publications","filters":[{"field":"type","value":"Test","opKey":"EQUALS"}],"sort":[{"field":"date","direction":"DESC","date":false}],"pageSize":5,"template":"<div>Subsection</div>"}]}]}]}'

6.4. Themes

This section describes about the "look and feel" of the application. This object is a collection of properties like the header, logo, footer, color, size, styles etc. The default theme view is seen in the Sample Response.

6.4.1. Directory

This displays a list of all the theme objects based on parameters like page, size or sort feature based on name, organization etc as shown in Request Parameters.

Request Parameters
Parameter Description

+page+

The page number.

+size+

The page size.

+sort+

The page sort.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+_embedded.themes+

+Array+

An array of Theme resources.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.

+page+

+Object+

Page details for Theme resources.
Sample Request
GET /themes?page=0&size=20&sort=name HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=MDdhNjlkMzMtOGIwMy00N2ZlLTg4OGYtZDAwNjllODVhNWMw
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2891

{
  "_embedded" : {
    "themes" : [ {
      "name" : "Test",
      "organization" : "Testing Unlimited",
      "active" : false,
      "home" : {
        "heroesNavigable" : false,
        "heroes" : [ {
          "imageUri" : "/assets/images/hero.png",
          "imageAlt" : "Hero",
          "watermarkImageUri" : "/assets/images/watermark.png",
          "watermarkText" : "Watermark",
          "baseText" : "This is only a test!",
          "fontColor" : "#ffffff",
          "linkColor" : "#000000",
          "linkHoverColor" : "#ffc222",
          "slideInterval" : 5000
        } ],
        "variables" : [ {
          "key" : "--test",
          "value" : "home"
        } ]
      },
      "header" : {
        "navbar" : {
          "brandText" : "Hello, World!",
          "brandUri" : "http://localhost:4200",
          "logoUri" : "/assets/images/logo.png",
          "links" : [ {
            "label" : "Home",
            "uri" : "http://localhost:4200"
          } ],
          "variables" : [ {
            "key" : "--test",
            "value" : "navbar"
          } ]
        },
        "banner" : {
          "imageUri" : "/assets/images/banner.png",
          "altText" : "Test",
          "variables" : [ {
            "key" : "--test",
            "value" : "banner"
          } ]
        },
        "variables" : [ {
          "key" : "--test",
          "value" : "header"
        } ]
      },
      "footer" : {
        "links" : [ {
          "label" : "About",
          "uri" : "http://localhost:4200/about"
        } ],
        "variables" : [ {
          "key" : "--test",
          "value" : "footer"
        } ]
      },
      "colors" : [ {
        "key" : "--red",
        "value" : "#ff0000"
      }, {
        "key" : "--green",
        "value" : "#00ff00"
      }, {
        "key" : "--blue",
        "value" : "#0000ff"
      } ],
      "variants" : [ {
        "key" : "--primary",
        "value" : "#007bff"
      }, {
        "key" : "--secondary",
        "value" : "#6c757d"
      }, {
        "key" : "--success",
        "value" : "#28a745"
      } ],
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--accent",
        "value" : "#ffc222"
      }, {
        "key" : "--navigation-color",
        "value" : "#3c0000"
      }, {
        "key" : "--navbar-color",
        "value" : "#ffffff"
      } ],
      "_links" : {
        "self" : {
          "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/12"
        },
        "theme" : {
          "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/12"
        }
      }
    } ]
  },
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes"
    },
    "profile" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/profile/themes"
    },
    "search" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/search"
    }
  },
  "page" : {
    "size" : 20,
    "totalElements" : 1,
    "totalPages" : 1,
    "number" : 1
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/themes?page=0&size=20&sort=name' -i -X GET \
    --cookie 'SESSION=MDdhNjlkMzMtOGIwMy00N2ZlLTg4OGYtZDAwNjllODVhNWMw'

6.4.2. Active

This search retuns an active theme based on the search/active parameter as shown in the Sample Request.

Sample Request
GET /themes/search/active HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2115

{
  "name" : "Test",
  "organization" : "Testing Limited",
  "active" : true,
  "home" : {
    "heroesNavigable" : false,
    "heroes" : [ {
      "imageUri" : "/assets/images/hero.png",
      "imageAlt" : "Hero",
      "watermarkImageUri" : "/assets/images/watermark.png",
      "watermarkText" : "Watermark",
      "baseText" : "This is only a test!",
      "fontColor" : "#ffffff",
      "linkColor" : "#000000",
      "linkHoverColor" : "#ffc222",
      "slideInterval" : 5000
    } ],
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "home"
    } ]
  },
  "header" : {
    "navbar" : {
      "brandText" : "Hello, World!",
      "brandUri" : "http://localhost:4200",
      "logoUri" : "/assets/images/logo.png",
      "links" : [ {
        "label" : "Home",
        "uri" : "http://localhost:4200"
      } ],
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--test",
        "value" : "navbar"
      } ]
    },
    "banner" : {
      "imageUri" : "/assets/images/banner.png",
      "altText" : "Tested",
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--test",
        "value" : "banner"
      } ]
    },
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "header"
    } ]
  },
  "footer" : {
    "links" : [ {
      "label" : "About",
      "uri" : "http://localhost:4200/about"
    } ],
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "footer"
    } ]
  },
  "colors" : [ {
    "key" : "--red",
    "value" : "#ff0000"
  }, {
    "key" : "--green",
    "value" : "#00ff00"
  }, {
    "key" : "--blue",
    "value" : "#0000ff"
  } ],
  "variants" : [ {
    "key" : "--primary",
    "value" : "#007bff"
  }, {
    "key" : "--secondary",
    "value" : "#6c757d"
  }, {
    "key" : "--success",
    "value" : "#28a745"
  } ],
  "variables" : [ {
    "key" : "--accent",
    "value" : "#ffc222"
  }, {
    "key" : "--navigation-color",
    "value" : "#3c0000"
  }, {
    "key" : "--navbar-color",
    "value" : "#ffffff"
  } ],
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/11"
    },
    "theme" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/11"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/themes/search/active' -i -X GET

6.4.3. Create

A theme is created by adding a fields like name, organization, header, footer etc along with other styling variables as shown in the Request Parameters. A theme when created, by default, has the active check set to false. This boolean flag, when checked will activate the specific theme.

Request Fields
Path Type Description

+active+

+Boolean+

Designates the theme currently in use.

+name+

+String+

The name of the theme. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+organization+

+String+

An organization the theme belongs to.

+home+

+Object+

A Home resource.

+header+

+Object+

A Header resource.

+footer+

+Object+

A Footer resource.

+colors+

+Array+

An array of Color resources.

+variants+

+Array+

An array of Variants resources.

+variables+

+Array+

An array of Variables resources.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+active+

+Boolean+

Designates the theme currently in use.

+name+

+String+

The name of the theme. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+organization+

+String+

An organization the theme belongs to.

+home+

+Object+

A Home resource.

+header+

+Object+

A Header resource.

+footer+

+Object+

A Footer resource.

+colors+

+Array+

An array of Color resources.

+variants+

+Array+

An array of Variants resources.

+variables+

+Array+

An array of Variables resources.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
POST /themes HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 1315
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=ZmM1NTk1MzQtZGZhZC00MTgzLWIwM2YtNmZiODJjNWJmOWE4

{"name":"Test","organization":"Testing Unlimited","active":false,"home":{"heroesNavigable":false,"heroes":[{"imageUri":"/assets/images/hero.png","imageAlt":"Hero","watermarkImageUri":"/assets/images/watermark.png","watermarkText":"Watermark","baseText":"This is only a test!","fontColor":"#ffffff","linkColor":"#000000","linkHoverColor":"#ffc222","slideInterval":5000}],"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"home"}]},"header":{"navbar":{"brandText":"Hello, World!","brandUri":"http://localhost:4200","logoUri":"/assets/images/logo.png","links":[{"label":"Home","uri":"http://localhost:4200"}],"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"navbar"}]},"banner":{"imageUri":"/assets/images/banner.png","altText":"Test","variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"banner"}]},"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"header"}]},"footer":{"links":[{"label":"About","uri":"http://localhost:4200/about"}],"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"footer"}]},"colors":[{"key":"--red","value":"#ff0000"},{"key":"--green","value":"#00ff00"},{"key":"--blue","value":"#0000ff"}],"variants":[{"key":"--primary","value":"#007bff"},{"key":"--secondary","value":"#6c757d"},{"key":"--success","value":"#28a745"}],"variables":[{"key":"--accent","value":"#ffc222"},{"key":"--navigation-color","value":"#3c0000"},{"key":"--navbar-color","value":"#ffffff"}]}
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Location: http://localhost:8080/themes/7
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2114

{
  "name" : "Test",
  "organization" : "Testing Unlimited",
  "active" : false,
  "home" : {
    "heroesNavigable" : false,
    "heroes" : [ {
      "imageUri" : "/assets/images/hero.png",
      "imageAlt" : "Hero",
      "watermarkImageUri" : "/assets/images/watermark.png",
      "watermarkText" : "Watermark",
      "baseText" : "This is only a test!",
      "fontColor" : "#ffffff",
      "linkColor" : "#000000",
      "linkHoverColor" : "#ffc222",
      "slideInterval" : 5000
    } ],
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "home"
    } ]
  },
  "header" : {
    "navbar" : {
      "brandText" : "Hello, World!",
      "brandUri" : "http://localhost:4200",
      "logoUri" : "/assets/images/logo.png",
      "links" : [ {
        "label" : "Home",
        "uri" : "http://localhost:4200"
      } ],
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--test",
        "value" : "navbar"
      } ]
    },
    "banner" : {
      "imageUri" : "/assets/images/banner.png",
      "altText" : "Test",
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--test",
        "value" : "banner"
      } ]
    },
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "header"
    } ]
  },
  "footer" : {
    "links" : [ {
      "label" : "About",
      "uri" : "http://localhost:4200/about"
    } ],
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "footer"
    } ]
  },
  "colors" : [ {
    "key" : "--red",
    "value" : "#ff0000"
  }, {
    "key" : "--green",
    "value" : "#00ff00"
  }, {
    "key" : "--blue",
    "value" : "#0000ff"
  } ],
  "variants" : [ {
    "key" : "--primary",
    "value" : "#007bff"
  }, {
    "key" : "--secondary",
    "value" : "#6c757d"
  }, {
    "key" : "--success",
    "value" : "#28a745"
  } ],
  "variables" : [ {
    "key" : "--accent",
    "value" : "#ffc222"
  }, {
    "key" : "--navigation-color",
    "value" : "#3c0000"
  }, {
    "key" : "--navbar-color",
    "value" : "#ffffff"
  } ],
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/7"
    },
    "theme" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/7"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/themes' -i -X POST \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    --cookie 'SESSION=ZmM1NTk1MzQtZGZhZC00MTgzLWIwM2YtNmZiODJjNWJmOWE4' \
    -d '{"name":"Test","organization":"Testing Unlimited","active":false,"home":{"heroesNavigable":false,"heroes":[{"imageUri":"/assets/images/hero.png","imageAlt":"Hero","watermarkImageUri":"/assets/images/watermark.png","watermarkText":"Watermark","baseText":"This is only a test!","fontColor":"#ffffff","linkColor":"#000000","linkHoverColor":"#ffc222","slideInterval":5000}],"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"home"}]},"header":{"navbar":{"brandText":"Hello, World!","brandUri":"http://localhost:4200","logoUri":"/assets/images/logo.png","links":[{"label":"Home","uri":"http://localhost:4200"}],"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"navbar"}]},"banner":{"imageUri":"/assets/images/banner.png","altText":"Test","variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"banner"}]},"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"header"}]},"footer":{"links":[{"label":"About","uri":"http://localhost:4200/about"}],"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"footer"}]},"colors":[{"key":"--red","value":"#ff0000"},{"key":"--green","value":"#00ff00"},{"key":"--blue","value":"#0000ff"}],"variants":[{"key":"--primary","value":"#007bff"},{"key":"--secondary","value":"#6c757d"},{"key":"--success","value":"#28a745"}],"variables":[{"key":"--accent","value":"#ffc222"},{"key":"--navigation-color","value":"#3c0000"},{"key":"--navbar-color","value":"#ffffff"}]}'

6.4.4. Delete

A theme can be deleted by passing the theme id as a path parameter. The active flag has to be set to false prior to delete. This will return a NO_CONTENT (204) http status code as shown in the Sample Response.

Path Parameters
Table 27. /themes/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Theme id
Sample Request
DELETE /themes/3 HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=M2YwNzllODgtZWYyZi00Njc1LWIwZmEtOTU4YjA1MDQxNjcw
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 204 No Content
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/themes/3' -i -X DELETE \
    --cookie 'SESSION=M2YwNzllODgtZWYyZi00Njc1LWIwZmEtOTU4YjA1MDQxNjcw'

6.4.5. Find by Id

A user, with an admin role, can find a theme by providing theme id as a path parameter. This returns a json response displaying the HttpStatus.OK(200) message along with the theme object as shown in the Sample Response.

Path Parameters
Table 28. /themes/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Theme id.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+active+

+Boolean+

Designates the theme currently in use.

+name+

+String+

The name of the theme. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+organization+

+String+

An organization the theme belongs to.

+home+

+Object+

A Home resource.

+header+

+Object+

A Header resource.

+footer+

+Object+

A Footer resource.

+colors+

+Array+

An array of Color resources.

+variants+

+Array+

An array of Variants resources.

+variables+

+Array+

An array of Variables resources.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
GET /themes/5 HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=YWUxYzJlZjAtYmZmZC00NGY1LWI3YzUtZThhZjkxMTIwYmYy
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2114

{
  "name" : "Test",
  "organization" : "Testing Unlimited",
  "active" : false,
  "home" : {
    "heroesNavigable" : false,
    "heroes" : [ {
      "imageUri" : "/assets/images/hero.png",
      "imageAlt" : "Hero",
      "watermarkImageUri" : "/assets/images/watermark.png",
      "watermarkText" : "Watermark",
      "baseText" : "This is only a test!",
      "fontColor" : "#ffffff",
      "linkColor" : "#000000",
      "linkHoverColor" : "#ffc222",
      "slideInterval" : 5000
    } ],
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "home"
    } ]
  },
  "header" : {
    "navbar" : {
      "brandText" : "Hello, World!",
      "brandUri" : "http://localhost:4200",
      "logoUri" : "/assets/images/logo.png",
      "links" : [ {
        "label" : "Home",
        "uri" : "http://localhost:4200"
      } ],
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--test",
        "value" : "navbar"
      } ]
    },
    "banner" : {
      "imageUri" : "/assets/images/banner.png",
      "altText" : "Test",
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--test",
        "value" : "banner"
      } ]
    },
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "header"
    } ]
  },
  "footer" : {
    "links" : [ {
      "label" : "About",
      "uri" : "http://localhost:4200/about"
    } ],
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "footer"
    } ]
  },
  "colors" : [ {
    "key" : "--red",
    "value" : "#ff0000"
  }, {
    "key" : "--green",
    "value" : "#00ff00"
  }, {
    "key" : "--blue",
    "value" : "#0000ff"
  } ],
  "variants" : [ {
    "key" : "--primary",
    "value" : "#007bff"
  }, {
    "key" : "--secondary",
    "value" : "#6c757d"
  }, {
    "key" : "--success",
    "value" : "#28a745"
  } ],
  "variables" : [ {
    "key" : "--accent",
    "value" : "#ffc222"
  }, {
    "key" : "--navigation-color",
    "value" : "#3c0000"
  }, {
    "key" : "--navbar-color",
    "value" : "#ffffff"
  } ],
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/5"
    },
    "theme" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/5"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/themes/5' -i -X GET \
    --cookie 'SESSION=YWUxYzJlZjAtYmZmZC00NGY1LWI3YzUtZThhZjkxMTIwYmYy'

6.4.6. Patch

This helps an admin user to partially update a theme. This process utilizes the http patch protocol.

Path Parameters
Table 29. /themes/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Theme id.
Request Parameters
Parameter Description

+active+

Designates the theme currently in use.

+name+

The name of the theme. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+organization+

An organization the theme belongs to.

+home+

A Home resource.

+header+

A Header resource.

+footer+

A Footer resource.

+colors+

An array of Color resources.

+variants+

An array of Variants resources.

+variables+

An array of Variables resources.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+active+

+Boolean+

Designates the theme currently in use.

+name+

+String+

The name of the theme. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+organization+

+String+

An organization the theme belongs to.

+home+

+Object+

A Home resource.

+header+

+Object+

A Header resource.

+footer+

+Object+

A Footer resource.

+colors+

+Array+

An array of Color resources.

+variants+

+Array+

An array of Variants resources.

+variables+

+Array+

An array of Variables resources.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
PATCH /themes/8 HTTP/1.1
Content-Length: 75
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=NWY2NTE5ZDMtMWY0Ni00NDMyLTkxOTMtNWExNWY5MjllZGVi

{"active": true, "header": { "navbar": { "brandText": "Hello, Scholars!"}}}
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2116

{
  "name" : "Test",
  "organization" : "Testing Unlimited",
  "active" : true,
  "home" : {
    "heroesNavigable" : false,
    "heroes" : [ {
      "imageUri" : "/assets/images/hero.png",
      "imageAlt" : "Hero",
      "watermarkImageUri" : "/assets/images/watermark.png",
      "watermarkText" : "Watermark",
      "baseText" : "This is only a test!",
      "fontColor" : "#ffffff",
      "linkColor" : "#000000",
      "linkHoverColor" : "#ffc222",
      "slideInterval" : 5000
    } ],
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "home"
    } ]
  },
  "header" : {
    "navbar" : {
      "brandText" : "Hello, Scholars!",
      "brandUri" : "http://localhost:4200",
      "logoUri" : "/assets/images/logo.png",
      "links" : [ {
        "label" : "Home",
        "uri" : "http://localhost:4200"
      } ],
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--test",
        "value" : "navbar"
      } ]
    },
    "banner" : {
      "imageUri" : "/assets/images/banner.png",
      "altText" : "Test",
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--test",
        "value" : "banner"
      } ]
    },
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "header"
    } ]
  },
  "footer" : {
    "links" : [ {
      "label" : "About",
      "uri" : "http://localhost:4200/about"
    } ],
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "footer"
    } ]
  },
  "colors" : [ {
    "key" : "--red",
    "value" : "#ff0000"
  }, {
    "key" : "--green",
    "value" : "#00ff00"
  }, {
    "key" : "--blue",
    "value" : "#0000ff"
  } ],
  "variants" : [ {
    "key" : "--primary",
    "value" : "#007bff"
  }, {
    "key" : "--secondary",
    "value" : "#6c757d"
  }, {
    "key" : "--success",
    "value" : "#28a745"
  } ],
  "variables" : [ {
    "key" : "--accent",
    "value" : "#ffc222"
  }, {
    "key" : "--navigation-color",
    "value" : "#3c0000"
  }, {
    "key" : "--navbar-color",
    "value" : "#ffffff"
  } ],
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/8"
    },
    "theme" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/8"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/themes/8' -i -X PATCH \
    --cookie 'SESSION=NWY2NTE5ZDMtMWY0Ni00NDMyLTkxOTMtNWExNWY5MjllZGVi' \
    -d '{"active": true, "header": { "navbar": { "brandText": "Hello, Scholars!"}}}'

6.4.7. Update

This helps an admin user to update a specifc theme based on the theme id provided in the path parameter. This utilizes the http put protocol.

Path Parameters
Table 30. /themes/{id}
Parameter Description

+id+

The Theme id.
Request Fields
Path Type Description

+id+

+Number+

The Theme id.

+active+

+Boolean+

Designates the theme currently in use.

+name+

+String+

The name of the theme. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+organization+

+String+

An organization the theme belongs to.

+home+

+Object+

A Home resource.

+header+

+Object+

A Header resource.

+footer+

+Object+

A Footer resource.

+colors+

+Array+

An array of Color resources.

+variants+

+Array+

An array of Variants resources.

+variables+

+Array+

An array of Variables resources.
Response Fields
Path Type Description

+active+

+Boolean+

Designates the theme currently in use.

+name+

+String+

The name of the theme. Must not be null. Size must be between 2 and 64 inclusive.

+organization+

+String+

An organization the theme belongs to.

+home+

+Object+

A Home resource.

+header+

+Object+

A Header resource.

+footer+

+Object+

A Footer resource.

+colors+

+Array+

An array of Color resources.

+variants+

+Array+

An array of Variants resources.

+variables+

+Array+

An array of Variables resources.

+_links+

+Object+

Links to other resources.
Sample Request
PUT /themes/6 HTTP/1.1
Content-Length: 1321
Host: localhost:8080
Cookie: SESSION=N2MxNWM4ZTYtZjdhNC00YzI0LWJjYWEtODI4YjI0ZGRiMzMx

{"id":6,"name":"Test","organization":"Testing Limited","active":true,"home":{"heroesNavigable":false,"heroes":[{"imageUri":"/assets/images/hero.png","imageAlt":"Hero","watermarkImageUri":"/assets/images/watermark.png","watermarkText":"Watermark","baseText":"This is only a test!","fontColor":"#ffffff","linkColor":"#000000","linkHoverColor":"#ffc222","slideInterval":5000}],"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"home"}]},"header":{"navbar":{"brandText":"Hello, World!","brandUri":"http://localhost:4200","logoUri":"/assets/images/logo.png","links":[{"label":"Home","uri":"http://localhost:4200"}],"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"navbar"}]},"banner":{"imageUri":"/assets/images/banner.png","altText":"Tested","variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"banner"}]},"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"header"}]},"footer":{"links":[{"label":"About","uri":"http://localhost:4200/about"}],"variables":[{"key":"--test","value":"footer"}]},"colors":[{"key":"--red","value":"#ff0000"},{"key":"--green","value":"#00ff00"},{"key":"--blue","value":"#0000ff"}],"variants":[{"key":"--primary","value":"#007bff"},{"key":"--secondary","value":"#6c757d"},{"key":"--success","value":"#28a745"}],"variables":[{"key":"--accent","value":"#ffc222"},{"key":"--navigation-color","value":"#3c0000"},{"key":"--navbar-color","value":"#ffffff"}]}
Sample Response
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
Location: http://localhost:8080/themes/6
Content-Type: application/hal+json
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Length: 2113

{
  "name" : "Test",
  "organization" : "Testing Limited",
  "active" : true,
  "home" : {
    "heroesNavigable" : false,
    "heroes" : [ {
      "imageUri" : "/assets/images/hero.png",
      "imageAlt" : "Hero",
      "watermarkImageUri" : "/assets/images/watermark.png",
      "watermarkText" : "Watermark",
      "baseText" : "This is only a test!",
      "fontColor" : "#ffffff",
      "linkColor" : "#000000",
      "linkHoverColor" : "#ffc222",
      "slideInterval" : 5000
    } ],
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "home"
    } ]
  },
  "header" : {
    "navbar" : {
      "brandText" : "Hello, World!",
      "brandUri" : "http://localhost:4200",
      "logoUri" : "/assets/images/logo.png",
      "links" : [ {
        "label" : "Home",
        "uri" : "http://localhost:4200"
      } ],
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--test",
        "value" : "navbar"
      } ]
    },
    "banner" : {
      "imageUri" : "/assets/images/banner.png",
      "altText" : "Tested",
      "variables" : [ {
        "key" : "--test",
        "value" : "banner"
      } ]
    },
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "header"
    } ]
  },
  "footer" : {
    "links" : [ {
      "label" : "About",
      "uri" : "http://localhost:4200/about"
    } ],
    "variables" : [ {
      "key" : "--test",
      "value" : "footer"
    } ]
  },
  "colors" : [ {
    "key" : "--red",
    "value" : "#ff0000"
  }, {
    "key" : "--green",
    "value" : "#00ff00"
  }, {
    "key" : "--blue",
    "value" : "#0000ff"
  } ],
  "variants" : [ {
    "key" : "--primary",
    "value" : "#007bff"
  }, {
    "key" : "--secondary",
    "value" : "#6c757d"
  }, {
    "key" : "--success",
    "value" : "#28a745"
  } ],
  "variables" : [ {
    "key" : "--accent",
    "value" : "#ffc222"
  }, {
    "key" : "--navigation-color",
    "value" : "#3c0000"
  }, {
    "key" : "--navbar-color",
    "value" : "#ffffff"
  } ],
  "_links" : {
    "self" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/6"
    },
    "theme" : {
      "href" : "http://localhost:8080/themes/6"
    }
  }
}
CURL Sample
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/themes/6' -i -X PUT \
    --cookie 'SESSION=N2MxNWM4ZTYtZjdhNC00YzI0LWJjYWEtODI4YjI0ZGRiMzMx' \
